content.prompt: The early stages of the core-periphery model describe the

choices.label: relationship between the outward appearance of a place and its internal functioning
ways that suburban workers commute to urban workplaces
relationship between the underlying structure of a society and its outward expressions
social and cultural differences between urban and rural people
relationship of power and the transfer of resources from less developed to more developed areas

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
